story.title: Title: Contact details for mature students queries

scenario.title: Title: Contact details for mature students queries Narrative: As a prospective mature student I wish to find out how I can contact college faculty So that I can ask specific questions related to course content Acceptance Criteria: Scenario 1: Contact details found on website
scenario.step: Given as a prospective mature student
Given that I am on the desktop website
When I click on the "Contact Us" tab
And select the relevant mature student queries option
Then I will be able to find contact details for mature students information Scenario 2: Contact details found on through mobile app
Given that I am logged in to the mobile app
When I click on the "Website" tab from the home screen
And the website display is loaded
And I click on the "Contact Us" tab
And select the relevant mature student queries option
Then I will be able to find contact details for mature students information
